lines.gurmukhi: cIkny kls pr jYsy nw itkq bUMd; kwlr mYN pry nwj inpjY n Kyq jI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a drop of water does not rest on a greasy pitcher and no seed grows in a saline soil.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ iQMDy GVy au`qy ijvyˆ pwxI dI bUMd nhIˆ itkdI qy k`lrI DrqI ivc bIijAw Anwj nhIˆ augdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Dir pr qru sybl APl Aru; ibiKAw ibrK Ply jgu duK dyq jI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as silk cotton tree is bereft of fruit on this earth, and just as a poisonous tree causes much trouble to the people.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ DrqI aupr isMml ruK Pl hIx hY Aqy zihrIlw ibRC Pl ky BI jgq nUM duK hI idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn subws bwNs bws bws bwsIAY nw; pvn gvn ml mUqqw smyq jI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a bamboo tree acquires no fragrance despite living near a sandalwood tree, and just as the air blowing over filth acquires the same bad odour.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: cMdn dI sohxI vwSnw bwˆs ivc aus dy nyVy v`s v`sky BI nhIˆ pRvyS krdI qy ml mUqR vwlI Qwˆ qoˆ lMGI paux ausy symq Bwv bdbUdwr hI huMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: gur aupdys prvys n mo irdY iBdy; jYsy mwno sÍwNiqbUMd Aih muK lyq jI [638[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly being like a greasy pitcher, saline land, silk cotton tree, bamboo tree and filth-polluted air, the sermon of the True Guru does not pierce my heart (it creates no ambrosial elixir). On the contrary, it feels as if a snake has just taken swati.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ gurU aupdyS myry ihrdy nUM ivMnHky ivc ipRvyS nhIˆ krdw, ijvyˆ s`p dw mUMh sÍwˆqI bUMd lYˆd hY myrw mn BI mwno aus sÍwˆqI bUMd nUM zihr bx dyˆdw hY ]638]
